Description of incident: Premera Blue Cross notified customers of a data breach of their system by a cyberattack that compromised medical, personal and financial data of 11 million customers.The information compromised included medical information, bank account numbers, Social Security numbers, birth dates, names, addresses and other personal information. "About six million of the people whose accounts were affected are  residents of Washington state, where customers include employees of  Amazon.com, Microsoft and Starbucks, according to Premera. The rest are  scattered across the United States."The breach was uncovered on January 29, 2015.More Information: http://www.nytimes.com/2015/03/18/business/premera-blue-cross-says-data-...
